ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Consensus triage roadmap aligning timeliness, equity, and survival.

bullets.item: Time-to-provider and ICU routing improvements by acuity bands.
Equity guardrails in triage scoring and audit reviews.
Data integration SLAs for EHR/EMS feeds supporting escalation.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Acuity-based fast-track and ICU pre-clearance for critical paths.
Batch maintenance and surge staffing pools with thresholds.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Equity audits and bias monitoring on triage outcomes.
